00043   class Key {
00044   public:
00045 
00046     static const char *END_ROW_MARKER;
00047     static const char *END_ROOT_ROW;
00048 
00049     static inline void encode_ts64(uint8_t **bufp, uint64_t val) {
00050       val = ~val;
00051 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00052       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 56);
00053       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 48);
00054       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 40);
00055       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 32);
00056       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 24);
00057       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 16);
00058       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 8);
00059       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)val;
00060 #else
00061       memcpy(*bufp, &val, 8);
00062       *bufp += 8;
00063 #endif
00064     }
00065 
00066     static inline uint64_t decode_ts64(const uint8_t **bufp) {
00067       uint64_t val;
00068 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00069       val = ((uint64_t)*(*bufp)++ << 56);
00070       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 48);
00071       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 40);
00072       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 32);
00073       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 24);
00074       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00075       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00076       val |= *(*bufp)++;
00077 #else
00078       memcpy(&val, *bufp, 8);
00079       *bufp += 8;
00080 #endif
00081       return ~val;
00082     }
00083 
00087     Key() : flag(FLAG_INSERT), timestamp_ptr(0) { return; }

00118     uint8_t       *timestamp_ptr;
00119     const uint8_t *end_ptr;
00120   };
